title: The Anti-allergic Effects of Specific Probiotics - a Double Blind Clinical Study

operands.value: Clinical diagnosis of allergic rhinitis based on sneeze attacks, runny/blocked/itchy nose in the absence of a common cold during the previous 12 months
History of positive skin prick test or blood radio-allergosorbent test (RAST) to grass and/or ragweed pollen
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 66 Years
Clinical history of lactose-intolerance or allergies to cow-milk

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Clinical diagnosis of allergic rhinitis based on sneeze attacks, runny/blocked/itchy nose in the absence of a common cold during the previous 12 months'), Symbol('History of positive skin prick test or blood radio-allergosorbent test (RAST) to grass and/or ragweed pollen'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 66 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('Clinical history of lactose-intolerance or allergies to cow-milk'), Symbol('Ongoing allergen immunotherapy'), Symbol('Pregnancy'), Symbol('Upper respiratory tract infection'))))
